author: Patrick Gavin Duffy
description: A Daiquiri with the addition of a dash of triple sec and maraschino.
name: Beachcomber
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
